At MATCHERON, we promote a respectful, inclusive environment. Please follow these guidelines to ensure a positive experience:
No hate, discrimination, or hostility towards any individual or group based on religion, ethnicity, gender, or any characteristic.
Create genuine profiles with accurate information. Fake profiles or impersonation will result in account deletion and a permanent ban.
Use clear, appropriate profile photos that accurately represent your current appearance.
All interactions must be respectful, courteous, and considerate, promoting understanding and harmony.
Behave in a friendly, polite manner. Insults, offensive language, and disrespect will not be tolerated.
Respect cultural differences and avoid making assumptions about others\' beliefs or backgrounds.
Harassing, stalking, or repeatedly bothering users is strictly prohibited.
Do not share explicit or offensive content, including images, memes, or language.

The app should not be used for commercial purposes, such as promoting products or services, soliciting donations, or offering escort services. Spamming other users with unsolicited messages is not allowed.
Contribute constructively and share insights that foster a supportive community.
Report any violations to moderators with details for prompt action.
Respect all religious beliefs and avoid derogatory or insensitive comments.
Do not share personal details publicly. Prioritize your privacy.
Follow age restrictions; minors should not engage in inappropriate interactions.
Avoid political debates unrelated to the app\'s purpose.
Violating these guidelines may result in profile removal and a permanent ban. Report violations with the username and relevant screenshots for prompt action.

Matcheron Mixers hosts nationwide social events, offering in-person gatherings for people to connect, socialize, and network. Open to all, these mixers focus on fostering serious, long- term relationships through structured activities that encourage meaningful interactions. The platform enables attendees to stay connected before and after events, helping relationships grow beyond the initial meeting. By blending real-world meetings with online follow- up, Matcheron Mixers creates opportunities for both personal and professional connections across the US. You will automatically receive notifications of Matcheron Mixers with the place and dates to attend with your friends.

At Matcheron.com, we value the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our dating and soulmates match-up platform. By using Matcheron.com, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
1. Information We Collect We collect the following types of information:

1.1 Personal Information When you create an account on Matcheron.com, we may collect personal information, including but not limited to: Name Email address Gender Date of birth Location Photographs Profile information (bio, preferences, etc.)

1.2 Sensitive Personal Information We understand the sensitivity of some information you provide, such as sexual orientation, relationship preferences, and other details that may be considered sensitive. We only collect such information with your explicit consent and for the purpose of improving your matchmaking experience.

1.3 Automatically Collected Information When you interact with our platform, we may collect information automatically, such as: IP address Device information Browser type Location data Cookies and usage data
2. How We Use Your Information We use your information for the following purposes:

To create and manage your profile To connect you with other users based on compatibility To personalize your experience and provide relevant recommendations To improve our services and platform features To send communications related to our platform (e.g., updates, promotions, customer support) To detect and prevent fraudulent activity.
3. Sharing of Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following situations:

With your consent, when you opt to share information with other users (e.g., profile visibility) With service providers who assist us in operating the platform (e.g., hosting, analytics, payment processors) If required by law or legal processes (e.g., subpoenas, court orders) To protect our platform, users, or the public from harm or illegal activity.
4. Your Choices and Rights You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
4.1 Access and Correction You may access and update your personal information at any time by logging into your account settings.
4.2 Deletion You may request the deletion of your account and personal information by contacting us. We will delete your data unless we are required to retain it for legal or security reasons.
4.3 Privacy Settings You can control the visibility of your profile and personal information by adjusting your privacy settings within the platform.

5. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as necessary to provide our services. We may also retain information to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, or enforce agreements.

6. Data Security We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

7. Children\'s Privacy Matcheron.com is intended for individuals 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are a parent or guardian and believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us so we can take appropriate action.

8. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify users of significant changes by posting the updated policy on our platform or sending a notice via email. Your continued use of Matcheron.com after such changes indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.
9. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us.

Matcheron Matchmaking Service (MMS):\nFind Your Perfect Match

At Matcheron, we simplify meaningful connections. For just $25/month, our expert matchmakers handpick matches based on your personality, preferences, and relationship goals. No algorithms—just real connections. Cancel anytime, no commitments.\nHow It Works:
1. Personalized Consultation: Connect via video, phone, or text to share your goals.
2. Curated Matches: We select ideal matches from a pool of real people.
3. Easy Introductions: Get direct introductions to potential matches.
4. Ongoing Support: Receive expert guidance for a lasting connection.
Subscribe today and find your perfect match—whether for casual dating, friendship, or a serious relationship.
Once the payment is successfully submitted. You will be instantly upgraded as Premium Member. Your Profile will appear in the Premium Showcase, and you will get all the benefits of a VIP Member.
